description: Episode of Series "The Nature of things". Municipal garbage is Public Enemy No. 1. While nature always recycles, man is the first animal who has broken the cycle. We must design for re-use, for to eliminate waste is to eliminate pollution. This program shows what amateurs and professionals are doing in Canada and the United States and makes suggestions for further strategies.
